Text: Hi I'm stuck at 66% please seed?! :)

Thanks for putting this up but unfortunately this is pretty much unwatchable. The video is very jerky all the way through and the sound is more than 2 seconds out of synch.

Sadly though this is the only copy of this that I can find :(
For those complaining elsewhere about Spanish dubs, this one is English by the way - So it's better than nothing!
